name: Chaos to Chaos
description:
IMPORTANT

In case you are wondering why your weapons don't work, you need to switch between them using 1-4. All items are activated/shot using the space key.

Story

Ever since the universe began, there has been nothing but CHAOS. Planets violently destroy each other sometimes aided by the intelligent life that resides upon them.

Do this, destroy your competition, remove all the threats and bring this chaotic world back to a peaceful emptiness. Return CHAOS to CHAOS. 

Gameplay

Destroy other planets to earn points. Gaining enough powerups allows you to choose between a set of awesome weapons/powerups. Level up enough times (4) to win the game!
